title: Asus K54 miss pwrbtn#
message:
I miss [B]Pwrbtn# - 0V. It comes from PCH and goes to KBC. KBC recived 3-0-3V from power button, lid - 3V, 3V power is present.
I know pwrbtn# pull up resistor is in PCH, and KBC just short pwrbtn# to ground when power button is pressed. But I am not sure if KBC is bad, so it always short pwrbtn# to ground or PCH is bad and it doesnot pullup 3V to this line.[/B]

title: Asus K54 miss pwrbtn#
message: Does it charge the battery? Was this liquid?

title: Asus K54 miss pwrbtn#
message: Was not liquid. Found only bad dc jack. How do you know if it charges the battery?

title: Asus K54 miss pwrbtn#
message: You connect a battery and watch the voltage go up.
